channel.title: How to change buy options?
channel.description: Ok, so far ive searched alot of freakin files and i cant find out how to do this... How to change the buy amount when you right click in a shop. For example, mine says 1,5,10,50. I wanna change the 50 to a higher number but i cant figure out which class file to look in lol. If someone could just tell me which file i could figure it out, thank you =]

item.title: How to change buy options?
item.dc:creator: @laurensman laurensman
item.description:
@laurensman wrote:

thank you =] that was alot of help lol i couldn’t find out where to look lol =] i would rep but cant =\

Read full topic

item.title: How to change buy options?
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

I am assuming you’re using PI.
Also, I am not 100% sure on this, but I’m almost certain this is it.

Go to your client files and open RSInterface.java and look for:

if(rsInterface.parentID == 3824) rsInterface.actions[4] = "Buy 50";
Change it to:

if(rsInterface.parentID == 3824) rsInterface.actions[4] = "Buy 100";

Now go server sided and open BankX1.java and look for:

Change it to:

Read full topic
